title: Apricot and White Chocolate Balls
directions: This is one of the easiest delights I’ve ever made.
All you need to do is mix all the ingredients together in a bowl and refrigerate covered overnight.
Take the dough out of the refrigerator and form into small balls about the size of a walnut and roll into coconut.
Keep the balls in the refrigerator until serving time.
ingredients: 200 g of finely chopped dried apricots.
½ tin of sweetened condensed milk.
